Interface BookingServiceInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
BookingService
public interface BookingServiceInterface
Interface for Booking Service Operations. Provides methods to manage gym slot bookings, cancellations, and status updates.
Author:
team IOTA

  • Method Details

    • checkAvailability

      boolean checkAvailability(int slotId, Date date)
      Checks the availability of seats for a specific slot on a given date.
      Parameters:
      slotId - the ID of the slot to check
      date - the date for which availability is to be checked
      Returns:
      true if seats are available, false otherwise

    • bookSlot

      int bookSlot(int userId, int slotId, Date date) throws SlotNotAvailableException
      Books a slot for a user on a specified date.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user booking the slot
      slotId - the ID of the slot to be booked
      date - the date for the booking
      Returns:
      true if booking is successful
      Throws:
      SlotNotAvailableException - if the chosen slot has no available seats

    • cancelBooking

      boolean cancelBooking(int bookingId) throws BookingNotDoneException
      Cancels an existing booking.
      Parameters:
      bookingId - the ID of the booking to cancel
      Returns:
      true if cancellation is successful
      Throws:
      BookingNotDoneException - if the booking cannot be found or cancelled

    • updateBookingStatus

      boolean updateBookingStatus(int bookingId, BookingStatus status) throws BookingNotDoneException
      Updates the status of a specific booking.
      Parameters:
      bookingId - the ID of the booking to update
      status - the new status to set for the booking
      Returns:
      true if the update is successful
      Throws:
      BookingNotDoneException - if the booking update fails

    • deleteBooking

      boolean deleteBooking(int bookingId) throws BookingNotDoneException
      Deletes a booking record from the system.
      Parameters:
      bookingId - the ID of the booking to delete
      Returns:
      true if deletion is successful
      Throws:
      BookingNotDoneException - if the deletion fails

    • getBookingCountForSlot

      int getBookingCountForSlot(int slotId)
      Retrieves the current number of confirmed bookings for a specific slot.
      Parameters:
      slotId - the ID of the slot
      Returns:
      the count of bookings for the slot

    • getBookingsByUser

      List<Booking> getBookingsByUser(int userId)
      Retrieves all bookings for a specific user.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user
      Returns:
      a list of bookings associated with the user

    • getAllBookings

      List<Booking> getAllBookings()
      Retrieves all bookings in the system.
      Returns:
      a list containing all booking records

    • hasUserBookedSlot

      boolean hasUserBookedSlot(int userId, int slotId)
      Checks if a user has already booked a specific slot.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user
      slotId - the ID of the slot
      Returns:
      true if a booking exists, false otherwise
